mapper.insert: insert into discount_code_configuration (id, code, to_user, upper_limit, stock, caculate_type, dead_line, status, create_time, create_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperLimit,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{stock,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{caculateType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{deadLine,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
